name: schedule_appointment_ortho
description:
Appointment scheduling. Actions: slots, grouped_slots, book_child, cancel.

slots: Get available times. Returns slots with displayTime.

grouped_slots: For siblings (2+ children). Returns grouped consecutive slots.

book_child: Book appointment. REQUIRES: patientGUID + slot details (startTime, scheduleViewGUID, scheduleColumnGUID).

cancel: Cancel using appointmentGUID.
schema: [{"id":0,"property":"action","type":"string","description":"The action: slots, grouped_slots, book_child, cancel","required":true},{"id":1,"property":"startDate","type":"string","description":"Start date MM/DD/YYYY (for slots)","required":false},{"id":2,"property":"endDate","type":"string","description":"End date MM/DD/YYYY (for slots)","required":false},{"id":3,"property":"scheduleViewGUIDs","type":"string","description":"Filter by schedule views (for slots)","required":false},{"id":4,"property":"numberOfPatients","type":"integer","description":"Number of patients (for grouped_slots)","required":false},{"id":5,"property":"timeWindowMinutes","type":"integer","description":"Time window in minutes (for grouped_slots)","required":false},{"id":6,"property":"patientGUID","type":"string","description":"Patient GUID (required for book_child)","required":false},{"id":7,"property":"startTime","type":"string","description":"Appointment start time MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS AM/PM (for book_child)","required":false},{"id":8,"property":"scheduleViewGUID","type":"string","description":"Schedule view GUID (for book_child)","required":false},{"id":9,"property":"scheduleColumnGUID","type":"string","description":"Schedule column GUID (for book_child)","required":false},{"id":10,"property":"appointmentTypeGUID","type":"string","description":"Appointment type GUID (for book_child)","required":false},{"id":11,"property":"minutes","type":"integer","description":"Appointment duration in minutes (for book_child)","required":false},{"id":12,"property":"appointmentGUID","type":"string","description":"Appointment GUID (for cancel)","required":false}]
